clarification: This question specifies the extent to which the level of civil liberties is generally the same across socioeconomic groups so that people with a low social status are not treated worse than people with high social status. Here, civil liberties are understood to include access to justice, private property rights, freedom of movement, and freedom from forced labor.
cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2clacjust, *_osp, *_ord
